= valuesToVars =
[http://code.google.com/p/querytemplates/w/list Wiki] > [Syntax Syntax] > [Syntax ] > [valuesToVarsMethod valuesToVars]
=== Parameters ===
 * *$varsArray* _array_



Behaves as var_export, dumps variables from $varsArray as $key = value for  later use during template execution. Variables are prepended into selected  elemets.
Method doesn't change selected elements stack.
Example  
{{{
 $data = array('foo' => 'bar', 'bar' => 'foo');
 $template['node1']->valuesToVars($data);

}}}
Source  
{{{
 <node1>
   <node2></node2>
 </node1>

}}}
Result  
{{{
 <node1>
   <?php
   $foo = 'bar';
   $bar = 'foo';
   ?>
   <node2></node2>
 </node1>

}}}
----


=== Comments allowed ===
